Package javelin.controller.fight

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Fight
    A battle scenario.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExhibitionFight
    Tournament event.
    IncursionFight  
    LairFight
    A moderate fight is teamel-4, a difficult fight teamel-2 (double the difficulty).
    PlanarFight
    Ultimate game challenge, in which a player is challenged by a team of their own encounter level.
    RandomDungeonEncounter
    Generates a harder battle than a RandomEncounter.
    RandomEncounter
    Fight that happens on the overworld map.
    Siege
    Battle when a player invades a hostile town.
    TownSiege
